alert.note: Alert for Lawrence (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Central Illinois (Central and East Central Illinois)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 20 at 9:11AM CST until February 27 at 2:00PM CST by NWS Central Illinois
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Illinois... Embarras River at Lawrenceville affecting Lawrence County. ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Illinois... Embarras River at Ste. Marie affecting Crawford and Jasper Counties. .The following forecasts are based on observed precipitation, soil moisture conditions, and forecast precipitation. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL EARLY SUNDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Embarras River at Lawrenceville. * WHEN...Until early Sunday afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 33.0 feet, Kelly`s Lake Lane, 1160N, is inundated. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:45 AM CST Sunday the stage was 33.9 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 8:45 AM CST Sunday was 33.9 feet. - Forecast...The river will rise to 34.4 feet tomorrow evening. It will then fall to 34.2 feet Tuesday evening. It will then fall below flood stage Sunday morning. - Flood stage is 30.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Fld Observed Forecasts (12 pm CST) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Mon Tue Wed Embarras River Lawrenceville 30.0 33.9 Sun 8 am CST 34.4 34.2 34.2 &&
info.instruction: Persons with interests along this river need to prepare for flooding. Stay tuned for further updates on this flooding situation.
